section.section: In this part, "coal combustion by-product" means the residue generated by or resulting from the burning of coal.

text.section:
On or before December 31, 2009, the Department shall submit to the Joint Committee on Administrative, Executive, and Legislative Review regulations regarding:
Fugitive air emissions from the transportation of coal combustion by-products in the State; and
The permissible beneficial uses of coal combustion by-products in the State.
